title: spigot如何用buildtools生成？
author: AnsonMao
txt_content:
首先我在https://www.spigotmc.org/下载了最新的BuildToolshttps://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/BuildTools/
然后也下载了最新的Git
https://www.git-scm.com/
在Windows的command下cd到了C:\Program Files\Git\cmd
然后把BuildTools.jar复制到C:\Program Files\Git\cmd
最后在cmd里执行了java -jar BuildTools.jar
但可惜的事提醒我：“You must run this jar through bash (msysgit)”


谁能帮助我下？谢谢！

replies.author: AnsonMao
replies.txt_content:
我已经知道如何解决了~
https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/buildtools/#what-is-it
